metadata.title: CVE-2018-19890 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the huffcodefunction (libfaac/huff2.c) in Freeware Advanced Audio Coder (FAAC)1.29.9.2. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and applicationcrash, which leads to denial of service in the book 2 case.

criterions.comment: faac package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
